root.name: String Split

example.code: alphabet = 'a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q,r,s,t,u,v,w,x,y,z' for letter in alphabet.split(','): # Split letters by ','. println(letter) # Print each letter on a separate line.

root.description: The method split() returns a list of all words in the string using the provided separator. An optional second argument limits the number of splits.
